reviews.review: I DONT CARE THAT IM 16 YEARS LATE BUT THIS GAME IS AMAZING

This is probably one of the best valve games created. The graphics still hold up today and the gameplay is very gripping. I would recommend playing the first game before this one, since it is a direct sequel and a there is a lot of callbacks to the original game. 10/10 would recommend to anyone who plays on steam

Even after 17 years this game still holds up very well, for the most part, certain levels which involve driving vehicles around can feel clunky at times and in some cases may drag on a little but that's more of a gripe on my part. Controlling Gordon and using the various weapons and tools at your disposal is extremely fun to mess around with, especially with the gravity gun allowing you to throw props like chairs and desks as a weapon. 

I just finished my second run of the game at the time of me writing this and still had a blast indulging myself back into the lore of this amazing franchise. 

So in the meantime, this is where I get off.....Until Half-Life 3 comes rolling around. I sadly do not have a Steam VR set to play Half-Life: Alyx :c
Does two Half Lives not equal one full life?

This game has new, liberating, and fun concepts and ideas for gameplay the entire way through. The story is amazing, and including the episodes is probably the best story in any game franchise. Undoubtedly one of the greats of PC, and overall gaming. Play it. Now. It's worth every penny.
this is one of if not the best game ever made can not stress that enough you can run it of any computer and looks great no mater what direction you look at this game it is amazing

Half Life 2, there's nothing more to say, one of the best games and one of the best game franchise ever made.  After Alyx we can wait for HALF LIFE 3 and it's no longer just a dream, it can be reality. This game is always fun to play and it was one of, this games when I truly had enjoyment collecting every achievement, I truly wanted to do it, when usually I don't, if you didn't play it yet, DO IT!
yeah it's good it's hl2 what do you think

Una joya del mundo del Gaming supo hacer muchos m√©ritos bien merecidos. Una historia extensa, misteriosa, con protagonistas inolvidables, escenarios y un motor que est√° bien pulido. La formula de disparos es buena y mejorada con nuevas mec√°nicas en las armas y en la forma en que interactuas con los objetos. La trama se sigue centrando en Gordon Freeman despu√©s de tiempo de los sucesos de Half Life 1 siendo un revolucionario contra la Alianza Combine en un pueblo oprimido que es el planeta.
Comprenderemos el trasfondo de la trama a tal punto que hasta hay huecos que llenarlos con teor√≠as.
 G Man se convierte en un personaje que participa de mejor forma que su antecesor.
Apartado de los controles es buena, f√°cil de comprender y aplicar. 
Apartado sonoro decente.
Bichos que cumplen con su prop√≥sito de dar asco y entre otras cosa. (Maldito Ravenholm)
Si habr√≠a una forma de comparaci√≥n entre su antecesor, este es mucho mejor.
Logros que llegan a ser divertidos de completar. 
Curiosidades muy curiosas jeje
Si te hes posible, compra las expansiones de HL Episode 1 y Episode 2 que tambi√©n est√°n muy buenas
Los enemigos son distinguibles y lo m√°s importante... La mayor parte del tiempo no son tan tontos. La inteligencia artificial est√° aceptable,

Agradecido con Valve a crear esta joya que deber√≠a ser considerado como un patrimonio en el futuro.

I have never actually beaten this game for some reason (even though I have beaten every other main entry in the series except Alyx), but it is a crucial part of anyone's steam library.  If not for the game itself, the clear importance of this game in the annals of gaming history makes it worthy of a buy.

"Rise and shine, Mister Freeman - rise and... shine. Not that I wish... to imply that you have been sleeping on... the job.
